trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> objects.

The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection> is accessed through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SchemaImporter.Extensions%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> class.
Adds the specified importer extension to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> to add.
The index of the added extension.
Adds the specified importer extension to the collection.
The *name* parameter allows you to supply a custom name for the extension.
A custom name for the extension.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> to add.
The index of the newly added item.
The value of *type* does not inherit from <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref>.
Clears the collection of importer extensions.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified importer extension exists in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> to search for.
`true` if the extension is found; otherwise, `false`.

Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> to the specified array of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> objects at the specified index.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> to copy the current collection to.
The zero-based index at which the collection is added.
Searches for the specified item and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> to search for.
The index of the found item.
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> into the collection at the specified index.
The zero-base index at which the extension should be inserted.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> to insert.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The index of the item to find.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
Removes the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref>, specified by name, from the collection.
The name of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> to remove.
The name is set using the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection.Add(System.String,System.Type)"></xref> method.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> to remove.
